favourite.article: Stay in the flow!!!
Spring up!!!
Calling "Oh Lord Jesus" keeps the burn within! Burn up oh well!
That's my heart's hymn.
What a beautiful song. It has really touched my heart. Praise God.
Praise The Lord we got RIVERS OF LIFE flowing within us!
What a wonderful song! üòÄ "Spring up, O well so I can experience, that life abundantly."
Lord spring up a well within our spirit!
It's beautiful. I want it for my google friends.
Stay in the flow!
I‚Äôve got a river of life flowing within me; It started gushing up when God set me free. That I keep the flow is my only plea. I‚Äôve got a river of life springing within me.
Really touched my heart.
I've got a river of life flowing within me!
i was refreshed :)

Calling, "Oh Lord Jesus," keeps the flow within! O LORD JESUS!!
One call a day keeps the devil away!! So call O LORD JESUS!!

Once I call His name there‚Äôs a flow within; It turns me from my day, makes Him Lord again. As my spirit burns, Satan cannot win. Calling, ‚ÄúOh Lord Jesus,‚Äù keeps the flow within.
Lord keep us calling and burning in spirit!
Spring up, O well, so we experience that life abundantly!!
Hallelujah!! Calling, ‚ÄúOh Lord Jesus,‚Äù keeps the flow within!!! :)

I really enjoyed this hymn with tears! My five American students and four Chinese students enjoyed it too in our home meeting last night!
I've got a river of life flowing within me ................................... Spring up O well! within my spirit Rise up and tell, so all can hear Spring up, O well, so I experience That life abundantly!
This happy song stirs up the young people's spirit, overflows from within them and gushes into the gospel friends! Who can reject the overflowing of the river? Amen! God can reach all people by this hymn! Give glory to Him!
Where besides on-line can we find this hymn? It is not in the black or young peoples hymn books?

The Recovery Version has a wonderful footnote on the well that the Israelites had to dig in order to enjoy the gushing water. This well is the Christ that is already inside of us, in our heart. So, we must dig away all the dirt, the barriers in our heart-mind, emotion, will, and conscience-so that the Spirit, the living water, may spring up and flow freely! Numbers 21:17-18 Spring up, O well!!!
O, spring up, brothers and sisters within our spirit so that we can experience the flowing.
This hymn just stirs up my spirit. We've got a river of life flowing within us, and it never runs dry. Praise the Lord.
Fantastic song. Especially verse 3-when my spirit burns Satan cannot win!

I love this hymn! A dear sister and I enjoyed this song very much for a week during the short-term training in Anaheim. We've got a spirit of life flowing from within! Spring uppp, so we experience!!! Lord, we love You! You are so enjoyable, and magnificent! :) Never failing, how wonderful!
Praise the Lord! Calling on the name of the Lord, "Oh Lord Jesus," keeps the flow within.
What a wonderful hymn this, it stire up my spirit to love and porsue more of Him...May the Lord will grant us more grace and mercy to supply us more through the Hymns..
This is a wonderful song that I like it very much. It can stir up my body, my soul, and my spirit. I believe church life is like this, very happy, and enjoyable.

I was so apprecaite concerning this song and I like to sing this because. I always love the flow of His life from Him to me as I still in the church which is His body the receiver of life. I remember that this river is so enjoyable if we are in meetings to praise Him. AMEN!
I like this song because it gives me a joyful feeling.
